column1:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8714" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">兵者，詭道也。故能而示之不能，用而示之不用，近而示之遠，遠而示之近，</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8715" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">實而備之，強而避之，怒而撓之，卑而驕之，佚而勞之，親而離之，出其不意，攻其不備。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8716" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">孙子曰：国之上下，死生之地，存亡之道，不可不察也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8717" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">夫未战而庙算胜者，得算多也；未战而庙算不胜者，得算少也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8718" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">将听吾计，用之必胜，留之；将不听吾计，用之必败，去之；</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8719" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">近于师者贵卖，贵卖则百姓财竭</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8720" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">知彼知己，百戰不殆；不知彼而知己，一勝一負；不知彼，不知己，每戰必殆</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8721" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故用兵之法，十則圍之，五則攻之，倍則分之，</word>
		<word type="NN">敵則能戰之，少則能守之，不若則能避之。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8722" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">是故百戰百勝，非善之善者也；不戰而屈人之兵，善之善者也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8723" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">古之所善戰者，勝於易勝者也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8724" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">是故勝兵先勝而後求戰，敗兵先戰而後求勝。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8725" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故善战者，立于不败之地，而不失敌之败也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8726" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">是故勝兵先勝而後求戰，敗兵先戰而後求勝。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8727" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">见胜不过众人之所识，非善之善者也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8728" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">积水之激，至于漂石者，势也。鸷鸟之疾，至于毁折者，节也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8729" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">鸷鸟之疾，至于毁折者，节也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8730" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故善战者，求之于势，不责于人。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8731" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故善战者，求之于势，不责于人。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8732" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">微乎微乎，至于无形；神乎神乎，至于无声；故能为敌之司命。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8733" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">人皆知我所以勝之形，而莫知我所以制勝之形。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8734" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故形兵之极，至于无形，无形，则深间不能窥，上智不能谋。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8735" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故敌逸能劳之，饱能饥之，安能动之。出其所不趋，趋其所不意。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8736" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">数赏者，窘也；数罚者，困也；</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8737" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">令素行以教其民，则民服。令不素行以教其民，则民不服。令素行者，与民相得也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8738" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">将弱不严，教道不明，将之过也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8739" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故战道必胜，主曰无战，必战可也；战道不胜，主曰必战，无战可也；</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8740" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">进不邀功，退不避罪，唯人是保，而利合于主，国之宝也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8741" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">吾士无余财，非恶货也。无余命，非恶寿也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8742" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">兵之情主速，乘敌所不及，由不虞之途，攻其所不备也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8743" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">施无法之赏，悬无政之令。犯三军之众，若使一人。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8744" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">敌间之来间我者，因而利之，导而舍之，故反间可得而用也；</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8745" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故明君贤将，能以上智为间者，必成大功。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8746" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">故三军之事，莫亲于间，赏莫厚于间，事莫密于间，</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8747" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">此（译注：用间）兵之要，三军之所恃而动也。</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="8748" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VB">Build</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP$">your</word>
		<word type="NN">opponent</word>
		<word type="DT">a</word>
		<word type="JJ">golden</word>
		<word type="NN">bridge</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="TO">to</word>
		<word type="VB">retreat</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PP">
		<word type="IN">across</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","1"
